http://schema.org/numberOfPages.description: The number of pages in the book.

http://schema.org/seasonNumber.description: Position of the season within an ordered group of seasons.

http://schema.org/requiredMaxAge.description: Audiences defined by a person's maximum age.

http://schema.org/issueNumber.description: Identifies the issue of publication; for example, "iii" or "2".

http://schema.org/commentCount.description: The number of comments this CreativeWork (e.g. Article, Question or Answer) has received. This is most applicable to works published in Web sites with commenting system; additional comments may exist elsewhere.

http://schema.org/numAdults.description: The number of adults staying in the unit.

http://schema.org/position.description: The position of an item in a series or sequence of items.

http://schema.org/numberOfSeasons.description: The number of seasons in this series.

http://schema.org/partySize.description: Number of people the reservation should accommodate.

http://schema.org/wordCount.description: The number of words in the text of the Article.

http://schema.org/numTracks.description: The number of tracks in this album or playlist.

http://schema.org/clipNumber.description: Position of the clip within an ordered group of clips.

http://schema.org/numberOfEpisodes.description: The number of episodes in this season or series.

http://schema.org/pageEnd.description: The page on which the work ends; for example "138" or "xvi".

http://schema.org/volumeNumber.description: Identifies the volume of publication or multi-part work; for example, "iii" or "2".

http://schema.org/numChildren.description: The number of children staying in the unit.

http://schema.org/reviewCount.description: The count of total number of reviews.

http://schema.org/numberOfItems.description: The number of items in an ItemList. Note that some descriptions might not fully describe all items in a list (e.g., multi-page pagination); in such cases, the numberOfItems would be for the entire list.

http://schema.org/userInteractionCount.description: The number of interactions for the CreativeWork using the WebSite or SoftwareApplication.

http://schema.org/answerCount.description: The number of answers this question has received.

http://schema.org/downvoteCount.description: The number of downvotes this question, answer or comment has received from the community.

http://schema.org/episodeNumber.description: Position of the episode within an ordered group of episodes.

http://schema.org/offerCount.description: The number of offers for the product.

http://schema.org/ratingCount.description: The count of total number of ratings.

http://schema.org/playersOnline.description: Number of players on the server.

http://schema.org/upvoteCount.description: The number of upvotes this question, answer or comment has received from the community.

http://schema.org/artEdition.description: The number of copies when multiple copies of a piece of artwork are produced - e.g. for a limited edition of 20 prints, 'artEdition' refers to the total number of copies (in this example "20").

http://schema.org/pageStart.description: The page on which the work starts; for example "135" or "xiii".

http://schema.org/requiredMinAge.description: Audiences defined by a person's minimum age.
